alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; Eastern Kiowa County; Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 21 at 12:54PM MST until January 21 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, especially across the southeast plains. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains and Huerfano, Las Animas, Crowley, Otero, Kiowa, Bent, Prowers and Baca Counties. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
